Deployment Setup Dialog Box

Use the Deployment Setup dialog box (Admin | Mover Setup) to enable users to access the Serena ChangeMan Mover Login page from Serena ChangeMan Version Manager (via Admin | Mover).

NOTE

  • The Mover URL is stored for each project database.

  • You must have Administrator privileges to specify the Mover URL in Version Manager.

Field Descriptions

Server URL Enter the URL to the Mover server in the format:

http://server:port/servlet.
